channel.description: Stay updated on the latest news and events happening in the RPI community.

item.title: RPI Capital Region Careers Networking Night | June 25
item.description: Are you eager to explore internship, co-op and job opportunities in the Capital Region? Look no further! Join the CCPD for an engaging evening of networking with esteemed local employers representing various industries. On Wednesday, June 25th 2025 from 6 to 8 PM in the Russell Sage Banquet Hall. Register today in Handshake and see all the employers who plan to participate!
item.author: Students

item.title: Griffis Business Park Tour & Luncheon | July 16
item.description: Join us for the 2025 Griffiss Business Park Tour on July 16 in Rome NY. This experience includes visits to leading tech and research organizations such as the Air Force Research Lab and Innovare Advancement Center. Students will also have the opportunity to connect with RPI alumni at a networking lunch at NYSTEC. Registration is required by June 15. Transportation is provided. When: Wednesday, July 16, 2025 9-5PM Where: Union Circle Register by June 15th: https://registration.socio.events/e/rpi
item.author: Students

item.title: School of Science Arch Field Trip: Utica Zoo | June 21
item.description: Date: Saturday, June 21, 2025 7:30 AM - 7:30 PM - ALL MAJORS WELCOME! Students will explore the Utica Zoo, which exhibits over 140 individual animals representing 64 species. Free breakfast and lunch will be provided. Meet at RPI Union horseshoe entrance at 7:30 AM, bus departure at 8:00 AM. Bus will return to RPI by 7:30 PM. Sign-up ends 4 PM on June 20.
item.author: Students

item.title: STEM Outreach Survey For Parents
item.description: Date: Tuesday, June 10, 2025 12:00 AM - Mon , June 16, 2025 12:00 AM - Are you a parent of a K-12 student? The RPI Engineering Outreach Program is looking to better understand how families engage with STEM and how we can improve access and support. This short, anonymous, survey (about 5 minutes) will help. Your input is greatly appreciated! If you have multiple children, please enter one form per child. Thank you!

item.title: Game Development Camp to be Held July 14-18
item.description: The Game Development Camp is a summer camp for Middle Schoolers and High Schoolers looking to jump start their game development careers at RPI. This 1 week long camp teaches students the basics of Game Design, Art, Animation, Audio, and Programming while taking a more serious look at video games and how they are made. Registration below. Join us July 14-18 in SAGE 2411. https://hass.rpi.edu/rpi-game-development-camp
item.author: Community

item.title: Rensselaer at Work Information Session Scheduled For June 13
item.description: Date: Friday, June 13, 2025 12:00 PM - 12:30 PM - Rensselaer at Work Dean Aric Krause, Ph. D., will be reviewing the online, project-based graduate degrees and certificates. Expect to hear details about how RPI Instructor Mentors provide industry expertise, advice, and mentorship in a targeted and experiential learning environment. Please RSVP if you plan to attend and learn more about Rensselaer at Work.
item.author: Community

item.title: No Pressure, Just Pride: LGBTQ+ Mixer | June 18
item.description: Celebrate Pride Month with the CCPD! On Wednesday, June 18th from 5-7pm, students, faculty, and staff who identify as LGBTQ+ or allies are invited to a low-stakes mixer in Sage Banquet Hall. Participants will get to know each other in a relaxed environment and learn about resources on- and off-campus. Hors d’oeuvres and refreshments will be served and the CCPD’s Clothing Closet will be available. Come as you are and join us for a night of community and joy!
item.author: Community

item.title: The Division of Human Resources is relocating!
item.description: The Division of Human Resources is relocating from the Gurley Building (21 Union Street, 2nd Floor) to our new home in the Chasan Building (405 Broadway, 1st Floor) on June 16, 2025. While our physical location is changing, all phone numbers and email addresses will remain the same.
item.author: Faculty and Staff

item.title: Division of Human Resources Professional Development Workshop: “Leading from Anywhere” | June 17
item.description:
Date: Tuesday, June 17, 2025 9:00 AM - 11:00 AM - At Rensselaer, we maintain that “leadership” involves a learnable set of actions and behaviors that is available to everyone. In this workshop, participants will explore the tenants that comprise everyday leadership and discuss the behaviors that define leadership not as positional or based on title, but rather on values and actions.
